sentence: April 28: Tom Nelson claims endorsement from Bernie Sanders-linked Our Wisconsin Revolution Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson gained an endorsement Thursday from a key liberal group, the Bernie Sanders-inspired Our Wisconsin Revolution.

title: Wisconsin U.S. Senate election updates: Tom Nelson claims endorsement from Bernie Sanders-linked Our Wisconsin Revolution
